mapper.select: SELECT m.memberseq, f.foltarget, m.profile FROM follow f JOIN member m ON m.nickname = f.foltarget WHERE f.memberseq = #{memberseq}
SELECT f.memberseq, m.nickname as foltarget, m.profile FROM follow f JOIN member m ON m.memberseq = f.memberseq WHERE f.foltarget = (SELECT nickname FROM member WHERE memberseq = #{memberseq});
mapper.insert: insert into inbody(inbodyseq, memberseq, uploaddate, weight, musclemass, bodyfatmass, imgpath) values (#{inbodyseq}, #{memberseq}, now(), #{weight}, #{musclemass}, #{bodyfatmass}, #{imgpath})
insert into bodycom(memberseq, uploaddate, weight, musclemass, bodyfatmass, imgpath) values (#{memberseq}, now(), #{weight}, #{musclemass}, #{bodyfatmass}, #{imgpath})
mapper.select: SELECT b.bbsseq, bbstag, title, content, wdate, rdate, ref, likecount, readcount, thumnail, nickname, COALESCE(cnt, 0) AS cmtcount FROM bbs b JOIN member a ON a.memberseq = b.memberseq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bbsseq, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM bbs_comment GROUP BY bbsseq ) c ON b.bbsseq = c.bbsseq WHERE b.bbstag = #{bbstag} AND b.del = 0 AND b.memberseq = ${memberseq} ORDER BY wdate DESC;

select b.bbsseq, title, content, profile, nickname, wdate, likecount, readcount, bbstag, a.ref, coalesce(cnt, 0) as cmtcount from bbs_comment b join bbs a on a.bbsseq=b.bbsseq left join ( select bbsseq, count(*) as cnt from bbs_comment group by bbsseq ) c on a.bbsseq = c.bbsseq left join member d on a.memberseq=d.memberseq where bbstag = #{bbstag} and del = 0 and b.memberseq = #{memberseq} group by b.bbsseq;
